name: Worldcrusher - a survival clicker game
description:
"Worldcrusher" is a simple clicker game that involves destruction of worlds, farming and a bit of space travel. Your world has been lost. Luckily, you've been given a chance to restore it. Travel through space, destroy other worlds piece by piece and collect the items in order to recover your own home.



Features:
  • Travel between planets, destroy plenty of objects on every one of them
  • Collect resources to restore your home planet
  • Grow plants in your homeworld
